name: Platty
description:
Platty

Platty is a Platforming Game designed in the style of an old Atari game, make your way through 10 thoughtfully designed levels and complete the game.

This game was submitted for the Bushfire Charity Jam of 2020, the game is not that long and was created in under a hour and a half, so don't expect for it to be a long game.
